314390.name: Super Trench Attack! Demo
314390.description:
Super Trench Attack™ is a goofball comedy twitch-shooter based in a World War setting.

STORYLINE
The Dastardly Black Army has invaded your homeland! The only thing between them and victory stands one man. A new recruit with a penchant for naked lady magazines and an eye for headshots. Enter the crazy world of Super Trench Attack.

GAME FEATURES
  • Unique targetting system,
  • Perform headshots and footshots,
  • 90FPS shooting action,
  • 4 huge open areas to explore,
  • 16 varied missions, including bosses and shooting galleries,
  • Buddy AI to help you out,
  • 4 shops offering unique items, weapons and traps, for a variety of ways to play,
  • Goofball bonkers humor,
314390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
